original_text: So there was great joy in Jerusalem: for since the time of Solomon the son of David king of Israel there was not the like in Jerusalem.
korean_text: 예루살렘에 큰 기쁨이 있었으니 이스라엘 왕 다윗의 아들 솔로몬 때로부터 이러한 기쁨이 예루살렘에 없었더라

sentences.original_text: So there was great joy in Jerusalem
for since the time of Solomon
son of David king of Israel
there was not the like in Jerusalem
